site.title: TmpMail - Temporary Email Service
site.description: Free temporary email service to protect your privacy and avoid spam. No registration required, generate temporary email addresses instantly.
site.keywords: temporary email,disposable email,spam protection,privacy protection,free email

about.title: About TmpMail
about.description: TmpMail is a free temporary email service that helps you protect your privacy and avoid spam.

features.title: Features
features.privacyDesc: No registration required, protect your real email address
features.temporaryDesc: Email addresses expire automatically after 24 hours
features.instantDesc: Generate temporary email addresses with one click
features.freeDesc: No payment required, free to use forever

whatIs.question: What is a temporary email?
whatIs.answer: A temporary email is a disposable email address used to receive emails without exposing your real email address. It's commonly used for website registration, downloading resources, or other scenarios requiring email verification.

howLong.question: How long can I use the email address?
howLong.answer: Each temporary email address is valid for 24 hours. After expiration, the email address will be deleted and cannot receive new emails.

isSafe.question: Is it safe to use temporary email?
isSafe.answer: Yes, using temporary email can protect your real email address from being leaked and avoid receiving spam. However, please note that you should not use temporary email to receive important personal information.

canSend.question: Can I send emails?
canSend.answer: Currently our service only supports receiving emails, not sending emails. This is to prevent spam generation.
